visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in blue color with a font size of 12px, Y-axis labels should be in green color with a font size of 14px, Data series: The series should be named 'Temperature' and contain the data provided in the JavaScript code, Custom colors: Use a gradient color from blue to red for the series, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to light gray, add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The X-axis is labeled with month names and styled with blue color and a font size of 12px. The Y-axis is labeled with temperature values, styled with green color and a font size of 14px, and has a red line with a width of 1 pixel. The data series is named 'Temperature' and contains monthly temperature data, with a gradient color from blue to red. The chart background is set to light gray, and the legend is positioned at the bottom center of the chart. The chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to ensure proper spacing.
